meanings: display model (e.g. plastic food models used by restaurants)

lessons.japanese: ＤＮＡのサンプルを貯える事は許されるべきではない。
lessons.indonesian: It shouldn't be permitted to store samples of DNA.

lessons.japanese: 「ちょっと・・・サンプル」シャーレに一部を保存した。
lessons.indonesian: "Let me get a sample," and she transferred part to a petri dish.
